org.xandercat.pmdb.controller

Class CollectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xandercat.pmdb.controller.CollectionController

  • @Controller
public class CollectionController
extends Object
    Controller for functions specific to movie collections management.
    Author:
    Scott Arnold

public String collections(org.springframework.ui.Model model,

      • addCollection

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/addCollection")
public String addCollection(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Page for adding a new movie collection.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        Returns:
        page for adding a new movie collection

      • addCollectionSubmit

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/addCollectionSubmit")
public String addCollectionSubmit(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                             Principal principal,
                                                                                             @ModelAttribute(value="collectionForm")
                                                                                             CollectionForm collectionForm,
                                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Process adding a new movie collection. If it is the user's first movie collection, automatically set it as the default/active collection for the user and take them to the home page (movie list) for that collection. If it is not the user's first movie collection, just return them to the movie collections management page.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        collectionForm - movie collection form
        result - binding result
        Returns:
        page following adding a new movie collection.

      • changeDefaultCollection

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/changeDefaultCollection")
public String changeDefaultCollection(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                     Principal principal,
                                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                                     String collectionId)
        Change the default/active collection for the user to the collection of given id and return them to the home page (movie list) for that collection.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        collectionId - id of movie collection to change to
        Returns:
        home page for the new default/active collection

      • deleteCollection

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/deleteCollection",
                method=POST)
public String deleteCollection(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                     Principal principal,
                                                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                                                     String collectionId)
        Delete movie collection of given id and return to collections management. There is no intermediate confirmation page; confirmation should be handled on client side.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        collectionId - id of movie collection to delete
        Returns:
        movie collections management page

                                                                                               @RequestParam

                                                                                               @RequestParam
                                                                                               String username)

        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        collectionId - id of movie collection to toggle edit permission on
        username - username of user to toggle edit permission for
        Returns:
        edit sharing page

      • revokePermission

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/revokePermission",

public String revokePermission(org.springframework.ui.Model model,

                                                                                                                     @RequestParam

                                                                                                                     String username)

        Returns:

      • revokeMyPermission

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/revokeMyPermission",
                method=POST)
public String revokeMyPermission(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                         Principal principal,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam
                                                                                                                         String collectionId)
        Revoke share of movie collection on self. This is for users who no longer want access to a movie collection that was previously shared with them.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        collectionId - id of movie collection that share is no longer desired of
        Returns:
        collections management page

      • shareCollection

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/shareCollection")
public String shareCollection(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                     Principal principal,
                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                     String collectionId)
        Page for sharing a movie collection with other users.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        collectionId - id of movie collection to update sharing on
        Returns:
        page for sharing a movie collection with other users.

      • shareCollectionSubmit

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/shareCollectionSubmit")
public String shareCollectionSubmit(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                 Principal principal,
                                                                                                 @ModelAttribute(value="shareCollectionForm")
                                                                                                 ShareCollectionForm shareCollectionForm,
                                                                                                 org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Process sharing of movie collection with another user. This is a low security process intended for a generally trusted user base. With a less trusted user base, the user would not be notified if the user reference was invalid, and users would have some measure of control over who could share collections with them.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        shareCollectionForm - form for sharing collection with another user
        result - binding result
        Returns:
        edit sharing page

      • importCollectionsSubmit

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/importSubmit")
public String importCollectionsSubmit(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                          Principal principal,
                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                          @ModelAttribute(value="importForm")
                                                                                          ImportForm importForm)
        Import a movie collection. This does not fully import the movie collection; it performs an initial analysis of the import in order to provide a series of import options before completing the import process.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        session - session
        importForm - form for importing a movie
        Returns:
        import options page

      • importOptionsSubmit

        @RequestMapping(value="/collections/importOptionsSubmit")
public String importOptionsSubmit(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                             Principal principal,
                                                                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                             @ModelAttribute(value="importOptionsForm")
                                                                                             ImportOptionsForm importOptionsForm,
                                                                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Import a movie collection. This performs the final import of the movie collection using the user options provided.
        Parameters:
        model - model
        principal - principal
        session - session
        importOptionsForm - form of users import options
        result - binding result
        Returns:
        collections management page
